title: Solr server should have the self start/stop script
description:
Start the solr server, need manual shell command to start.
The start/stop script easy to let admin deploy and control server, especial stop solr server. Directly kill the process, that doesn't good choice. 

Shell script can let the start/stop more easy, and some parameter can be configuration in the properties file.

comments.author: Raintung Li
comments.content:
Property file -> config for solr start
Solr.sh -> Shell script run in the linux.
